about_the_game:
Bricks Survivors is a unique game that blends the retro charm of classic brick-breakers with the intensity of modern roguelites. Dive into a captivating experience where every session is a battle for survival, set in a nostalgic pixel art universe with thoroughly modern gameplay mechanics.

Key Features :

Roguelite Brick-Breaker : Experience a new twist on the classic brick-breaker with roguelite elements. Each game session is different, featuring procedurally generated levels, unique power-ups to unlock, and increasingly challenging brick-shaped enemies.

Boss System : Face off against 5 unique bosses in each run, randomly selected from a vast pool of varied and challenging bosses. Inspired by old-school brick-breakers, these bosses appear as complex stages where you must clear all the bricks in under a minute to advance—a true test of speed and precision !

Solo Survival : Fight for survival against waves of falling bricks that descend faster and faster. If a brick touches the ground, it's game over. Strategy, quick reflexes, and smart terrain management will be your best allies in avoiding the inevitable.

Retro Pixel Art Style : The game is entirely crafted in pixel art, bringing a nostalgic and authentic visual touch. All graphics and animations have been carefully designed to capture the essence of the classics while offering a modern experience.

Inspirations : Reimagining the classic brick-breaker with roguelite and survival elements, Bricks Survivors takes the best of retro games and modernizes them for an even more addictive experience.

Developed by a single passionate creator, Bricks Survivors is currently available exclusively on PC. It's the perfect game for fans of challenges, retro gaming, and innovative mechanics. Dive into this pixelated world, face the bricks, and prepare to survive!
